message: I saw Peeps in the store yesterday and thus gives you today's QOTD.  Personally, I think they're GROSS (and I love marshmallows!). Equally gross is my sister who opens them up to let them solidify before eating them! *shudder*  What about you?
It's sugar on sugar with sugar topped with sugar. What's not to like about them? Yeah...they're pretty gross.
I’m with your sister @blogkitten, Peeps taste best when left to air-dry for a day or so. It helps to reduce their chemical aftertaste of petroleum…
Gross......until you dip them in dark chocolate then it magically turns into yummmm!
Of course their gross, that's why they are awesome!  ...and even better stale!
